title: Building editor: crash when creating walls on a new level

content.raw:
Steps to reproduce:

1. Add a level (without creating any walls)

2. Go to level 2

3. Try create walls and gzclient crashes


```
#!c++

Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
0x00007ffff6e36d37 in gazebo::gui::EditorView::mouseDoubleClickEvent (this=0x345c420, 
    _event=0x7fffffffd320) at /home/ian/depot/clones/gazebo3/gazebo/gui/building/EditorView.cc:486
486	      floorList[wallItem->GetLevel()-1]->AttachWall(wallItem);
(gdb) bt
#0  0x00007ffff6e36d37 in gazebo::gui::EditorView::mouseDoubleClickEvent (this=0x345c420, 
    _event=0x7fffffffd320) at /home/ian/depot/clones/gazebo3/gazebo/gui/building/EditorView.cc:486
#1  0x00007ffff5a6a15e in QWidget::event(QEvent*) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
#2  0x00007ffff5e2a3f6 in QFrame::event(QEvent*) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
#3  0x00007ffff6054b6b in QGraphicsView::viewportEvent(QEvent*) ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
#4  0x00007ffff54f7028 in QCoreApplicationPrivate::sendThroughObjectEventFilters(QObject*, QEvent*) ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtCore.so.4
#5  0x00007ffff5a1985f in QApplicationPrivate::notify_helper(QObject*, QEvent*) ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
#6  0x00007ffff5a1f0bf in QApplication::notify(QObject*, QEvent*) ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
#7  0x00007ffff54f6e9c in QCoreApplication::notifyInternal(QObject*, QEvent*) ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtCore.so.4
#8  0x00007ffff5a1a862 in QApplicationPrivate::sendMouseEvent(QWidget*, QMouseEvent*, QWidget*, QWidget*, QWidget**, QPointer<QWidget>&, bool) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
#9  0x00007ffff5a99c35 in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
#10 0x00007ffff5a98bee in QApplication::x11ProcessEvent(_XEvent*) ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
#11 0x00007ffff5ac2112 in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
#12 0x00007ffff013cd53 in g_main_context_dispatch () from /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libglib-2.0.so.0
#13 0x00007ffff013d0a0 in ?? () from /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libglib-2.0.so.0
#14 0x00007ffff013d164 in g_main_context_iteration () from /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libglib-2.0.so.0
#15 0x00007ffff55263bf in QEventDispatcherGlib::processEvents(QFlags<QEventLoop::ProcessEventsFlag>) ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtCore.so.4
#16 0x00007ffff5ac1d9e in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
#17 0x00007ffff54f5c82 in QEventLoop::processEvents(QFlags<QEventLoop::ProcessEventsFlag>) ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtCore.so.4
#18 0x00007ffff54f5ed7 in QEventLoop::exec(QFlags<QEventLoop::ProcessEventsFlag>) ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtCore.so.4
#19 0x00007ffff54faf67 in QCoreApplication::exec() () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtCore.so.4
#20 0x000000000047fd28 in gazebo::gui::run (_argc=1, _argv=0x7fffffffe1a8)
    at /home/ian/depot/clones/gazebo3/gazebo/gui/GuiIface.cc:273
#21 0x0000000000455269 in main (_argc=<optimized out>, _argv=<optimized out>)
    at /home/ian/depot/clones/gazebo3/gazebo/gui/main.cc:23

```
